programme.title: Wildest India: The Himalayas: Surviving the Summits
programme.desc: The Himalayas run across 2,500km of north India. he Himalayas' rugged highlands offer little direct refuge to humans, in the shadow below, over a billion people in India rely on the mountains for survival.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Ethiopia: Land of Extremes
programme.desc: Landlocked and surrounded by five countries, Ethiopia is one of east Africa's forgotten lands. Seemingly passive deserts in fact seethe with fire, and cloud-piercing peaks shield a secret Eden of canyons and cliff-tops teeming with life.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Rainforest

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Madagascar: Islands of Monsters
programme.desc: Madagascar is truly a weird and wonderful land. Isolated on an island of extreme and magical looking locations, life has adapted and diversified. With few predators, numbers have proliferated and natural selection has gone mad.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Coast of the Whalesharks
programme.desc: On the remote coastline of Australia’s northwest, there are great natural wonders to be found. Above the sea on this sunbaked coast, there is very little; only a sparse landscape shaped by the arid conditions. But here, the miracle reveals itself…

programme.title: Deadly Women: Baby-Faced Killers

programme.title: Deadly Women: Senseless Slayings

programme.title: Deadly Women: Lover's Revenge
programme.desc: These women burn madly with anger so deep they'll kill to satisfy it. What makes them turn on the ones they love? Find out as we explore the reasons for a lover's revenge.

programme.title: Deadly Women

programme.title: Deadly Women

programme.desc: Two young boys were the only witnesses to their mother's murder. The horrible crime appeared unmotivated, senseless and random.

programme.desc: For the 2008 launch of Crime Investigation Australia, CI presents the complete and compelling story of "The Killing Fields of Truro", one of the most infamous crimes in Australia and yet another set in Adelaide.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Moonstruck
programme.desc: Alex is overcome by toxic fumes while cleaning an old water tank. Jodi advises Meg on how to fix her relationship with Terry.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: If You Build It
programme.desc: Stevie locks horns with Sandra, but finds herself helping Sandra through a crisis.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Out of Time
programme.desc: Stevie faces the biggest decision of her life: should she tell her daughter Rose who her real mother is?

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Betwixt and Between
programme.desc: Rose discovers her life is a lie and Stevie pays a terrible price.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Truth or Dare
programme.desc: Predators are everywhere on Drovers Run as Dave’s brother drops from the sky.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The King And I
programme.desc: Jodi’s world is turned upside down when she receives a birthday gift from the late Jack McLeod.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive “behind the scenes” look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chad Hallock, the co-founder of Budget Blinds, the largest window covering Franchise Company in the United States, is going undercover and posing as an out of work artist looking for a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Dead Presidents
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to King George, Virginia to become the first paranormal team to investigate Belle Grove Plantation.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Soul Searching
programme.desc: For the first time ever, TAPS revisits Belcourt Castle in Newport, Rhode Island to investigate claims surrounding a deceased friend.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Dudley Dead Wright
programme.desc: A homeowner's property backs up to land where a cursed 1740's village once stood.Could evil entities have traveled from that property tothis terrified mother's homeputting her family at risk?

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Titanic Terror
programme.desc: TAPS gets on board the Titanic Exhibit at the Georgia Aquarium in Atlanta to investigate paranormal claims that have traveled around the world with the artifacts.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tag, You're It
programme.desc: To his traditional bounty hunting tools of confidential informants, canvassing, and silver-tongued subterfuge the world's greatest bounty hunter has added Facebook! A word to the wise for those on the run-post at your own peril, the Dog is watching!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Family Affair
programme.desc: Dog likes to say, "The apple doesn't fall far from the tree," and this is a hunt where that is true. So will Dog be able to use one family member's troubled ways to catch another one in trouble with the law?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Training Day
programme.desc: While the team tries to handle the bond that newcomer Alysin wrote incorrectly, sparks are flying between Beth and Duane Lee when he questions Beth's decision to go on the hunt without Dog leading the charge!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cutting the Apron Strings
programme.desc: Two different young men both have a bad habit of missing their court dates. Looking over their files Dog senses that they have another trait in common, both are a little too tied to their mothers.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Short Handed
programme.desc: Dog's target today has a history of violence, and apparently plans to re-locate without notifying the proper authorities. Unfortunately the team is missing a key player, Duane Lee is MIA today distracted by his new lady love.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Photo Op
programme.desc: Dog and Duane Lee can't agree about what role Duane Lee should have in the family business. But the family comes together as they set out to hunt a chronic violator with an open warrant and a wife who has an odd request for Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A House Divided
programme.desc: Dog has dropped Duane Lee from the team. When Leland confronts Dog and Beth about the decision tempers flare. But they have to come together to answer a cry for help from a mother who feels that the safest place for her daughter is jail.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All Grown Up
programme.desc: Cecily has graduated from High School and Dog believes the time is right to show her what the family business is all about. The rough and tumble world of bounty hunting is very different than the all girls private school she attended.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fight Like A Girl
programme.desc: This one is close to home. Dog's target on today's hunt is the cousin of Kali, Garry Boy's caregiver. In addition, she has a reputation as a brawler. With Duane Lee still missing from the team Baby Lyssa decides she will step-up in this hunt.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.desc: After discovering that Martin has to miss a Friday night poker game for a date, the guys (as well as their wives) take turns figuring out the best way to coach him for romance. When babysitting for Jep and Jessica turns into a rocky road.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hot Tub Grime Machine
programme.desc: The guys realize that Godwin has never really asked them for a favor, even though they are all always helping each other out. Godwin asks them to help him get a hot tub, so they set out to help him pick one up.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A-Jase-ent Living
programme.desc: Due to construction at Jase and Missy's house, Willie and Korie invite Jase and the kids to live with them while Missy is out of town visiting friends. Then, what begins in the duck call room as a series of "Gentlemen's Bets".

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Termite Be a Problem
programme.desc: Because of a termite problem at Duck Commander, the guys are forced to find a different location to work from - Godwin's House. But while at Godwin's house, Godwin gets a taxidermied gift from a past relative.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: John Luke After Dentist
programme.desc: John Luke and Sadie are getting some dental work done, complete with sedation, and it's up to Willie and Korie to take care of them through the process - including getting them back home safely.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Scoot Along Si
programme.desc: Si shows up to work on a mobility scooter, claiming to have an invisible injury from a fender bender with Willie. After losing her beloved turtle "Mr. T", Ms. Kay enlists Phil on a mission to find a new pet turtle.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jerky Boys
programme.desc: A decision to try and make some duck jerky leads the boys to Godwin's garage and a minibike race. Phil and Kay have made Willie the executor of their will, and Phil wants to show Willie what he and his brothers will inherit when he and Kay pass away.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Going Si-ral
programme.desc: Si discovers Youtube, and, after watching a series of instructional videos, decides he can make something better. John Luke totals Willie's truck, and Willie realizes he may be raising the two worst drivers in all of Louisiana.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack-O-Lantern
programme.desc: The Robertsons host a Halloween event at Duck Commander, where they all come together to transform the warehouse into a "scarehouse." Everyone dresses up and Willie desperately tries to be the scariest, but none of the kids are afraid of him.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.desc: The Robertsons perform a live nativity for their Church for Christmas, so the wives organize rehearsals to ensure that they pull off a great event. However, rehearsals get off to a bumpy start as the guys can't stop sharing their opinions.

programme.title: Drug Wars: The Rio Grande Smokescreen
programme.desc: Border Patrol in the Rio Grande Valley is on the hunt for illegal narcotics smuggled over from Mexico

programme.title: Drug Wars: Smuggler’s Cove
programme.desc: Border units are busy tracking down boats loaded with drugs and illegal aliens. In San Diego Bay a boat tries to blend in with the holiday crowd, but agents soon take notice of its extreme weight

programme.title: Drug Wars: The Walk to Freedom
programme.desc: Hundreds of migrants try to enter the US every day. Some are forced to work as drug mules, with many perishing during the harsh desert crossing.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Bricks in the Wall
programme.desc: Arrests spike along the border wall as residents of India and Pakistan leap over, right into the hands of the border patrol. Other teams investigate new smuggling tunnels

programme.title: Drug Wars: Joint Operations
programme.desc: For the first time, camera crews are allowed inside the Foreign Operations Branch Mission, a joint partnership between US authorities and Mexican Federales.

programme.title: Drug Wars: The Trap is Set
programme.desc: With dangerous threats identified and targeted, the Foreign Operations Branch and other units partner together to apprehend convicted felons and smugglers.

programme.title: Drug Wars: The Panama-Colombia Confrontation
programme.desc: U.S. Navy Frigate U.S.S. Rentz is followed as its crew investigates a suspicious fishing boat in the Caribbean.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Undercover Agents
programme.desc: Tips from undercover agents lead to a high-speed chase and a shootout in Panama City. In Cartagena, Colombia, a tip leads the Armada on a wild goose chase before they track down the real smugglers.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Manhunt
programme.desc: Panamanian police go on a manhunt for a notorious gang leader trying to smuggle drugs; at the same time, the USS Rentz race to get across the Panama Canal in time to make a bust.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Engine Fail
programme.desc: The engineers on the USS Rentz must repair their ship in time. They need to go quick to catch up with suspected traffickers. Panamanian troops venture in to the remote jungle to confront a violent paramilitary army from Colombia smuggling drugs.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Player of the Year
programme.desc: Jordan says that Taurean is the biggest player with the ladies and still decides to lie about it even after she gave him a chance to have an open relationship. He says he talks to other women because Jordan is unaffectionate and verbally abusive.

programme.title: Divorce Court: My Money
programme.desc: Barbara says Alicia is a cheater and a thief. Barbara's seen Alicia’s text messages from men and asserts she is verbally abusive and financially irresponsible. Alicia says Barbara is controlling, a liar, selfish and never committed to their marriage.

programme.title: Divorce Court: I Scream U Scream
programme.desc: Sharee moved in with Brandon shortly after they met, had a child and still no marriage. Brandon wants her to get a full-time job and not work part-time in their business before they get married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Coming to America
programme.desc: Keith claims he is married to two other women overseas and plans to bring them over! Paw'lla says Keith is a fake pastor who doesn't know what he's talking about! Keith says he has a master plan for all of these wives!

programme.title: Divorce Court: Studs Need Love Too
programme.desc: Tahani said Cymbre's jealous fits of rage has caused her to lose a job and suspects him of cheating after finding a hotel receipt! He doesn't trust her either after she cheated before. Will this couple be able to trust again or are they too far gone?

programme.title: Divorce Court: To the Left
programme.desc: This relationship between high school sweethearts has turned sour. Tonesha, though she converted to Islam for Theotis, says he still has a lot of growing up to do before they get married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Computer Love
programme.desc: As soon as this couple got engaged their romance hit the rocks. Brandi says that Brittanie can’t tell the truth if her life depended on it. Brittanie says Brandi’s insecurities and lack of trust has had a severe effect on their relationship.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Man
programme.desc: Kadaveion and Justice’s anger issues are tearing them apart. Kadaveion doubts he fathered their baby, but Justice says he’s a liar who gave her a STD and is ready to leave him. Can Judge Toler find a solution or have they already made up their minds?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Sixth Sense
programme.desc: Takashia says Brendon doesn’t approve of her friends, doesn’t trust her and is controlling. Brendon says he can’t trust Takashia because she is a nonstop attention seeker and never passes up an opportunity to flirt with men.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lonely Nights
programme.desc: Christina says Ramon is a cheater, runs from his financial responsibilities and their sex life is in the gutter. He’s tired of her enabling his family to the point, he takes refuge in hotel rooms to get a break from her.

programme.title: Divorce Court: All Eyes on Me
programme.desc: Selina is sleepless in Sarasota, lying awake in the night, calling her boyfriend Derrick to make sure he’s alone. He admits he sees other women, but doesn’t consider it cheating because he’s not having sex. How much longer can Selina play detective?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Nana Bread
programme.desc: Markia says Herb's overactive sex drive is ruining their relationship because he wants it daily. When Herb doesn't get his way, he throws major tantrums. Can Herb learn to take breathers or has this 11 year relationship taking its toll?

programme.title: Operation Repo: Segway This Way
programme.desc: First, Matt and Sonia hit the beach to repossess an old-fashioned classic surfer car from an old-fashioned surfer looking for a classic tussle. Then, Froy and Matt stretch their wits to identify and take down an uncooperative Segway renter.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Cement Mixer
programme.desc: When a debtor and his friends resort to baseball bats, chaos erupts, and Lou, Lyndah, and Sonia fight not only with them but also with each other. Down in Texas, Matt and Froy wait to clear up Froy's warrant and get in way over their heads working...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Rolling Away
programme.desc: First, Lou, Sonia, and Froy have to push away a debtor while trying to push a classic car up a hill and onto the flatbed. And later, Matt and Froy head out on a repo for a BMW, but when the camera guy refuses to leave the car and Matt's lunch starts to...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Frankie'd Up Beyond All Recognition
programme.desc: Matt and Froy face incredible odds against a Texas-sized biker gang looking for a beat down, and when bullets fly, it starts to look like they may never come back home. Back in LA, Frankie's wild antics jeopardize a repo and push Lyndah to her breaking...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Mile High Mayhem
programme.desc: On this special season finale of Operation Repo, the team gears up for a mile-high repo of a lifetime! Froy and Sonia repo a water blob from a lake house, but the RO and his friends refuse to let this deflate their party.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Little Froy's Big Mistake
programme.desc: Matt and Froy take on a grungy fisherman, but when he isn't afraid to damage his own boat, Froy is the one who is sinking fast.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Deep Dish Disaster
programme.desc: Lou plans an elaborate sting operation to infiltrate a cult, but everything goes awry when the new guys aren't prepared and Matt is left picking up the pieces.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Burgers, Bottles, and Hustlers
programme.desc: Lou and Sonia repo a compact sedan from a trio of gun-wielding, bottle-breaking gangsta gals. Then, Matt and Froy get some fast food when they deal with an irate burger-slinger who won't honor Matt's order for his car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Broken Tooth Lou and Bad Breath Frankie
programme.desc: First, Froy and Lyndah probably need to schedule a trip to the dentist after Lou's tooth gets knocked out in the course of a tense confrontation with two irate debtors. Then, Frankie seriously blows a routine voluntary repo when the owner smells something

programme.title: Operation Repo: Repo Basher vs. Matt
programme.desc: Lou and Froy repo a vehicle in a bad part of town and somebody gets punched in the face. Then, Sonia and Lyndah interrupt a tennis match to retrieve an automobile. Plus, Matt and Froy confront an out-of-control director in the middle of a shoot.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Big Letdown
programme.desc: Froy meets with a lawyer, but his legal troubles are worse than expected. Sonia and Froy confront a debtor who uses a homeless man in his ploy to keep his car. Then, Sonia and Froy discover one debtor's alcoholism is only a farce to cover a bigger secret.

programme.title: The Game: Party In A Box
programme.desc: Chardonnay throws a surprise party for Jason at her apartment thinking it'll be a good way to meet his friends.

programme.title: The Game: Fits And Starts
programme.desc: Tasha and Pookie awkwardly explore becoming more than friends.

programme.title: The Game: A Woman's Right To Choose Herself
programme.desc: Tasha struggles with her decision to carry Melanie and Derwin's baby in light of her budding romance with Pookie. Meanwhile, Jason offers financial help to Chardonnay and ends up giving her more than he bargained for.

programme.title: The Game: Breakthrough. Breakdown? Break-Through
programme.desc: An unhappy Melanie does some soul searching and concludes that she wants to finish her residency at John Hopkins.

programme.title: The Game: Let Them Eat (Cup) Cake!
programme.desc: While Melanie is away interviewing for a residency position at Johns Hopkins in D.C., Derwin does everything he can to avoid returning to an empty home.

programme.title: The Game: Cold Swine Sucks...And So Does Falling In Love
programme.desc: Tasha reads a text message on Pookie's phone and finds out he's been living with another woman. Meanwhile, due to the urging of Melaine, Derwin pushes Irv to explore a new contract offer in D.C.

programme.title: The Game: Move Trick, Get Out Of The Way
programme.desc: Melanie and Derwin butt heads during the Sabres champsionship game week while Malik gets in a heated dispute when picking Jenna up from rehab.

programme.title: The Game: The Championship Game Episode
programme.desc: In the season finale, after winning the champsionship game, Derwin and Melanie settle on a resolution to their potential long distance relationship.

programme.title: The Game: The Blueprint, Pt. 1
programme.desc: Derwin's personal and professional life arein disarray after he is traded from the Sabers. Meanwhile, #1 draft pick Bryce "Blue" Westbrook celebrates his Sabers acquisition by attending Malik's pop-up party.

programme.title: The Game: The Blueprint, Pt. 2
programme.desc: Romantic complications ensue for Blue and Keira after she helps him deal with the aftermath of his scuffle with Derwin. Meanwhile, Malik and Jason talk Derwin down from his confrontation with Blue.

programme.title: The Game: We've Gotta Stop Meeting Like This
programme.desc: Tasha takes steps to prove to Pookie that she's dedicated to him while simultaneously struggling with her attraction to Rick. Keira and Blue address the aftermath of their New York encounter after constantly running into each other in San Diego.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Name
programme.desc: Ryan Buell and company set out on one of their most dangerous cases to date - to help a single mother who is experiencing paranormal activity in a home that was once the site of brutal murder.

programme.title: Paranormal State: School House Haunting
programme.desc: PRS travels to Massachusetts to investigate an old schoolhouse where children's voices disturb a couple who've made it their home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Bedroom Eyes
programme.desc: PRS travels to rural Pennsylvania to investigate a haunting that began after a new couple moved into an old family farm.?Over the next three days, hidden tragedies are uncovered and latent psychic abilities are revealed.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Lady Vampire
programme.desc: PRS investigates a case involving single mom, Dawn, and her 5-year-old daughter, both of whom are tormented by the appearance of a hag they call "lady vampire."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Church of the Damned
programme.desc: Jason and his family can no longer do renovations of an abandoned Kansas church, especially after they found their father in the basement crying and frightened because of the menacing activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Pet Cemetery
programme.desc: Ryan and his team investigate the bizarre haunting of a woman and her dog in Waterboro, Maine. The Labrador was chewing at her own fur and standing on guard on the bed, growling at unseen figures.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Knickerbocker
programme.desc: PRS checks into the Knickerbocker Hotel in Linesville, Pennsylvania where the owners are reporting strange noises and the appearance of phantom children in some of the rooms.

programme.title: Paranormal State: They Only Come Out at Night
programme.desc: Once night falls in a quaint?New England Town, a police officer's family is terrorized by demons.?PRS arrives just in time with the family ready to vacate their family home, rather than suffer the advances of these spirit creatures.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Sex Dungeon
programme.desc: Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey and Chad Calek join PRS for this unusual case of a sprawling mansion on Greyhaven Island near Detroit. Ken, the owner, hears voices and banging and it has him feeling both watched and cursed; a prisoner in his own home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Room & Board
programme.desc: The owners of a vacation lodge in the remote town of North Hudson, NY, feel their woodsy getaway is plagued by negative spirits.

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! MOST HAUNTED
programme.desc: Yvette and her team continue their investigation into this mysterious place. With something seemingly stalking the crew the night ends with a particularly vigorous spirit in a very small room.

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! MOST HAUNTED
programme.desc: Yvette and team are put to the test as activity seems to be all around them, something is following them but who or what. Could it be the spirit of a man they connect who died near the house over 100 years ago?

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! MOST HAUNTED
programme.desc: From the start activity prevalent in this historical building. Glen is faced with something unexplained early on, Gregg is faced with his most demanding vigil yet and the rest of team chase a sinister shadow that lurks in the dark corridor

programme.title: Most Haunted: ACCRINGTON COURTS PT1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding leads Most Haunted to Accrington's old police station and courts, housing playful spirits and malevolent entities. Is the evil too much for the team?

programme.title: Most Haunted: ACCRINGTON COURTS PT2
programme.desc: The second part of Yvette Fielding and the Most Haunted team's investigation at the now-abandoned old police station and courts in Accrington. With the team splitting up to cover as much space as they can, something seems to be stalking them.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: We Have Forever - Part 1
programme.desc: Jonathan hopes that he'll be released from his duties to be reunited with his former wife when she passes away.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: We Have Forever - Part 2
programme.desc: Jonathan hopes that he'll be released from his duties to be reunited with his former wife when she passes away.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Correspondent
programme.desc: A war correspondent finds himself imprisoned and facing execution. Meanwhile, Jonathan and Mark show him what's he's missed during his life by putting work ahead of family.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Aloha
programme.desc: A Hawaiian singer learns to overcome self-pity after being disabled in a truck accident.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Dolphin Song for Lee - Part 1
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help a teenage cancer patient named Lee who wants to save the dolphins.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4
programme.desc: Sarah's absence couldn't have come at a worse time for Leopard's Den. Nature Conservation is carrying out their annual inspection and everything has to be tip top. Danny's determined they pass with flying colours and everyone is roped in to help.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 5
programme.desc: Everyone's excited at the prospect of Leopard's Den's new arrival. Bash, Danny's old tutor and Rosie's Godfather, is coming from England to help Danny grow his veterinary practice.

programme.title: Survivors With Denise Welch
programme.desc: In May 2019, 24-year-old Bethany Marchant, mother of one, was subjected to a violent attack by her then-partner, Stefan Carr. In September 2019, Stefan was sentenced to 11 years and three months. Bethany is now an activist supporting Clare's Law.

programme.title: Survivors With Denise Welch
programme.desc: Adele Bellis was left with permanent scarring, partially bald, and without her right ear when Jason Harrison threw sulphuric acid at her. This was at the request of her violent and emotionally abusive ex-boyfriend, Anthony Riley.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder

programme.title: World's Greatest: Capital Cities
programme.desc: With visionaries, politicians, and activists, these metropolises are defined as the official seats of government. Dublin, Washington, and Taipei share broad avenues, museums, and monuments, but are as varied as the countries they represent.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Treks
programme.desc: Every journey made by foot promises a grand adventure. From the highest mountains to the wildest jungle realms, treks venture down the road less travelled, allowing us to connect to nature, history, and culture, one step at a time.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Rivers
programme.desc: Rivers flow freely - beautiful and powerful waterways that underscore the melody of life. As they meander through the landscape, they shape it, wearing down ranges and deepening valleys, eventually flowing out into the sea.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Extreme Animals
programme.desc: Extreme Animals features environments hostile to humans, but havens to many animals. Witness gorgeous glow-worms, high flying condors, parched thorny devils, emperor penguins, and polar bears in this journey through life on the edge.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Mountains
programme.desc: The earth’s fragile crust has folded and faulted, and nowhere are these natural forces more evident than in the world’s great mountains. Explore the highest peaks of the world’s terrain - the rugged realm between heaven and earth.

programme.title: Arthur's First Day
programme.desc: It's finally the first day of fourth grade and Arthur couldn't be more excited - until he learns Buster is in another class! Meanwhile, D.W. is nervous for her first day of kindergarten. Will Arthur and D.W. be able to make new friends?

programme.title: Arthur: Hic or Treat/Mr. Alwaysright
programme.desc: D.W. gets a case of the hiccups that just won't go away. Will she have them for the rest of her life and set the world record? It seems that Brain is always right about everything and it's really starting to get on Buster's nerves.

programme.title: Arthur: Cents-less/Buster the Lounge Lizard
programme.desc: Mr. Ratburn decides it's time for his class to learn a little about money. For the entire weekend, no one in the class can spend a cent. Buster has the brand-new Dark Bunny Dark Buggy, complete with grappling hook and voice commands!

programme.title: Arthur: Falafelosophy/The Great Lint Rush
programme.desc: Sue Ellen tries her hand at writing and illustrating a graphic novel. Then, Mr. Toad is back! And he's ready to corner the Sock Market, leaving everyone in Elwood City barefoot and bereft.

programme.title: Arthur: The Squirrels/Fern and Persimmony Glitchet
programme.desc: After watching the classic horror movie, "The Squirrels," Arthur and his friends are scared to step out into the playground, and everywhere else! Fern's story about perfect Felicity Bonchance is thought perfectly boring by her friends.

programme.title: Arthur: Sue Ellen's Lost Diary/Arthur's Knee
programme.desc: Poor Sue Ellen has lost the one thing she's never without--her diary. Then, Arthur's hurt his knee but won't tell Mom--because then she'd know he'd been playing down at the dump , where he was NOT allowed to go.

programme.title: Arthur: Three's a Crowd/A is for Angry
programme.desc: Prunella's loves doing yoga with her mom, but when her best friend joins them, will she be able to share her time? When Arthur decides to take on The Brain at a checkers competition, everyone rallies behind the underdog.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur And The Big Riddle/Double Dare
programme.desc: Alex Trebek lends his voice as gameshow host Alex Lebek in this episode which poses the age-old riddle--is winning really everything? What if your friends dared you to skip homework--and then double dared you to skip school?

programme.title: Arthur: Molina's Mulligan/Buster Bombs
programme.desc: Alberto discovers he has a natural talent for golf and begins to compete, but will his dad's embarrassing cheers make him give it up? Buster has lost his flair for funny, and the harder he tries to make people laugh, the worse it gets.

programme.title: Field of Valor
programme.desc: It was becoming clear in 1939 that direct U.S. involvement in World War Two was only a matter of time. Training approximately 500 to 750 pilots a year, the United States Army Air Corps was severely outmatched by the warring powers of Europe and Asia.

programme.title: Gestapo: Hitler's Secret Police
programme.desc: Hermann Goering’s Secret State Police were tasked to arrest and torture confessions and information from supposed enemies of the Reich.

programme.title: NEW: Great Tank Battles of World War II
programme.desc: This first part of the series introduces the first tanks being deployed on the battlefields in northern France during WWI and describes the devastating effect these steel monsters had on an infantry confronted with them for the very first time.

programme.title: NEW: Great Tank Battles of World War II
programme.desc: The second episode starts on the morning of the 22nd of June 1941 when the Germans launched operation Barbarossa, the code name for the invasion of the Soviet Union.

programme.title: NEW: Great Tank Battles of World War II
programme.desc: The third episode opens with Rommel’s second offensive in North Africa.

programme.desc: Long Islander Catherine has fallen deeply in love with country boy Graham from Tennessee. She's ready to uproot her life to be a country girl with him, but Nev and Max uncover that Graham's not everything he claims to be.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Blaire & Markie
programme.desc: When Blaire's Instagram lover Markie broke her heart, she moved on. But now Markie is back and wants to meet. Blaire needs Nev and Max's help to make it happen and reveal Markie's secret.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Joanna was about to meet her online love in the flesh, but a crazy night in Vegas caused the whole relationship to go sour. Now she's enlisted Nev to help track down her former flame. (S5, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Hundra never planned on falling in love with a girl and is risking coming out on national TV to learn if her love is for real. Nev investigates to reveal a shocking Catfish.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jamey and Ari

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Whip It Good
programme.desc: With a motocross bike and a rare stock whip up for grabs, Ton and Allen face one of their toughest competitors yet: their former employee Carolyn, who knows all their tricks, has money to burn and is out for revenge.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Tough as Nails
programme.desc: CJ seeks to disrupt Allen's search for serenity at a storage auction before the guy's head to a live auction to buy and sell. They uncover an unusual Marilyn Monroe statue, an industrial slip n' slide, and a bed of nails.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Wreck-Shaw
programme.desc: Allen drags a starving Ton to a weekend auction and some newbie buyers try to eat up all the profit. Will a rickshaw, a wrecking ball, and blast detonators be enough to satisfy Ton's appetite, or will the guys go home hungry?

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Always Money in Philadelphia
programme.desc: In Philadelphia, the guys face a shady bidder with inside information and former NFL star Vince Papale in a battle for a vintage football passing machine and a colonial musket that could be worth huge money if it's real.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Risk & Reward
programme.desc: Ton & Allen arrive late to an auction. They uncover vintage bear traps and a bounty of street art. If the pieces belong to the artist, RISK, it could be their biggest score ever. If not, they'll be stuck with forged knockoffs.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Once a Pawn a Time
programme.desc: Ton and Allen discover that owning a pawn shop is way more trouble than they expected. With bills stacking up, even an antique ammo collection and some classic football helmets may not be enough to put the guys in the black.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: To Pawn or Not To Pawn

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Big Sis Ducks Out

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Party Gras

programme.title: JAG: The Bridge At Kang So Ri

programme.title: COPS: Borderlands

programme.title: COPS

programme.title: COPS: Cops Dishonest Dudes

programme.title: COPS

programme.title: Tonbo!

programme.title: Tonbo!

programme.title: Tonbo!

programme.title: Flashpoint

programme.title: Flashpoint

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: When Scrambler tells Spud that Bob is putting together the machinery for Farmer Pickles’ sunflower oil factory, he decides that putting things together is something he’d be very good at. So he heads off to the factory to lend a hand.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is building a lean-to for Mr Beasley’s allotment. Wendy offers to pick up the materials from JJ’s yard, while Bob makes a start on the cement floor. But before he can leave, Bob gets a call from Mr Dixon, who needs a hole in his roof fixed urgently.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Scoop is keen to enter the town’s snowman competition, but a burst pipe outside Mr Sabatini’s needs fixing. Scoop is anxious when he sees the snowman that Mr Sabatini has made for the competition.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The team are building Sunflower Valley’s first geodesic dome. As Wendy has organised the dome and knows how it all fits together, Bob suggests that she might like to take charge of the job. Reluctantly Wendy agrees.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the gang are building a pedestrian crossing. Mrs Percival, meanwhile, has asked Molly to paint a mural of a jungle scene in the school playground.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are installing a bull-rush water recycling system to clean water from Farmer Pickles’ cottage. The clean water will be used to water Farmer Pickles new orchard. Bob explains that everything needs to be built in order – it’s a process.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The Team are converting Mr Sabatini’s windmill into a café. Roley is rolling the ground flat for all the tables and chairs while Bob makes the awnings. Roley hits trouble when molehills keep appearing where he’s just been rolling.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Sabatini has decided to move from Bobsville to set up the Sunflower Valley bakery. Bob and the team are going to build him a new house close to the river. Muck asks if Spud can tag along as he’s been telling him exciting stories.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the gang leave to convert a house into two separate flats. Mr Bentley, meanwhile, has been left in charge of The Mayor’s dog.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is building a marshland walkway with his Dad’s help. Benny hears that the marsh is ‘like a jungle’ and becomes determined to finds some jungle animals like tigers. Every time he spots one, however, it turns out to be something very ordinary.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is repairing a leaking water tank at the school, when he discovers bats in the belfry. He tapes up the tank temporarily, but says the bats will need a new home as they are a protected species.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob has promised to put a cat flap in his kitchen door for Pilchard, but he gets an urgent call from Farmer Pickles who needs a fence built to keep the rabbits out of his lettuce field.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Farmer Pickles has a new family of Pigs being delivered to his farm and Bob must build a new home for them. In the meantime, Farmer Pickles places the pigs in an old Barn to keep them safe.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: It’s the team’s first full day in Sunflower Valley and the machines are all a bit nervous of the mammoth job ahead. All except for Muck who is determined to show that he’s not a bit worried. Travis arrives with Bob’s new mobile home.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The whole town is practicing for an egg and spoon race, which Mrs Percival has organised. Trix decides to enter, but unfortunately she practices with fresh eggs and in her usual haste she manages to make a great mess in JJ’s yard.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob has a day off and he takes a trip to Farmer Pickles farm to take some photographs for the town photography competition. Wendy, meanwhile, has been called to the school hall where a pipe has burst, threatening the competition.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is installing an antique fireplace for Mrs Percival. He goes to JJ’s yard to collect it and finds JJ playing with his new model aeroplane. Bob then heads to Mrs Percival’s and starts to knock out the old fireplace.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr. Beasley decides to grow pineapples, and the best way top do this is to build a pineapple pit – a special pit, heated by horse manure! Travis wants to help and decides to fetch some horse manure from Farmer Pickles farm in Bobsville as quick as he can.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Jimmy Savile

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: April Jones

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Lee Rigby

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Rachel Nickell

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Shalimar's former boyfriend shows up and is trying to recover a Fabergé Egg that holds a microchip of extraordinary power.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team tries to stop Eckhart from acquiring a rare element, but a thief gets it. The woman who has the ability to make men fall in love with her sets her sights on Brennan.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Mutant X encounters a new faction of New Mutants called the Strand, led by the powerful first mutant Gabriel Ashlocke.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Horizon Zero

programme.desc: Navy Seal major Raymond McIntyre kidnaps Da'an and demands to know where his men are. They were involved in a inter-dimensional space flight test that went wrong.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Scarecrow Returns
programme.desc: Research continues on the 'scarecrow' probe. Boone starts learning Taelon to interpret its messages. The device meanwhile absorbs a scientist, Rayna.

programme.title: The Lost World: All or Nothing
programme.desc: After watching Summerlee fall from a destroyed bridge, Marguerite and Veronica attempt to find him. Tribune rescues Roxton but expects payment in kind.

programme.title: The Lost World: Amazons
programme.desc: The men find themselves embraced by a tribe of Amazons and discover they are to be studs for the breeding ritual, but this purpose may come with a fatal end.

programme.title: The Lost World: Tourist Season
programme.desc: Challenger builds a windmill. But when his generator is struck by lightning, a portal is opened that ushers in a helicopter carrying a family of tourists from the year 2000.

programme.title: The Lost World: Stone Cold
programme.desc: An ominous castle draws three of the adventurers under its paranormal influence. Roxton, Marguerite, and Malone take on new personalities while the mansion entangles them in a love triangle.

programme.title: The Lost World: Divine Right
programme.desc: A riderless horse leads Roxton to a tribe that makes him king. He must either accept the title or face execution, while the rest of the group is captured.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Dinnerladies Anne Reid and Thelma Barlow join Paul Laidlaw and David Harper for a trip around Oxfordshire. Armed with a classic car and £400 each, the teams take in wartime artwork then compete at auction in Penkridge, Staffordshire.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Simon Williams and Duncan Preston join James Lewis and Philip Serrell for a trip around Essex, looking for items to auction in Torquay, Devon. On the way, Duncan tries an ancient craft and someone has a tale to tell about Boris Johnson.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Daddy Day Care

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: NEW Leap Of Faith
programme.desc: Jordan gives Chloe the birthday surprise of her life! Shannon and Charlie decide to split. Sassi connects to her faith and gets a lot off her chest. Amber's birthday ends in tears. (S4, ep7)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Shock And Surprise
programme.desc: Jordan whisks Chloe away to Paris for a big portion of romance and snails! Shannon thinks she might be pregnant. It's a big day for Sassi, and Amber comes to a decision about Ste. (S4, ep8)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Amber comes clean to Ste about her new man. Jordan's behaviour goes from bad to worse. Shannon snoops through Charlie's phone. Devastating news brings Dylan and Megan together. (S5, ep2)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK

programme.title: 48 Hours: Strange Truth
programme.desc: In March 2003, Ramona Krotine left an office party and was never seen alive again. 24 hours later, she was found in the trunk of her car, beaten and shot to death. At first, police suspected a botched robbery but later believed her husband was to blame.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Last Confession
programme.desc: Relatives of a beauty queen who was murdered more than 50 years ago suspect a priest committed the crime.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Exposed
programme.desc: A report about serial killer Bill Bradford, who posed as an amateur photographer and told women he’d make them famous. Convicted of two murders, Bradford has been on death row since 1988.

programme.title: 48 Hours: My Father's Killer
programme.desc: James Bernard Campbell entered SueZann Bosler's home, murdered her father and almost killed her. 48 HOURS follows SueZann as she returns to the crime scene and then focuses on her unusual crusade for justice.

programme.title: 48 Hours: While Innocents Slept
programme.desc: A report based on the murder case involving the deaths of two infants which were originally attributed to SIDS (Sudden Infant Death Syndrome).

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Ben takes Bobby under his wing in a hope to destroy Hank and Jean. However, Ben's mental state is starting to crack. Cooper starts to look at buying real estate. Major Briggs's supervisor reveals that Briggs was studying transmissions from the woods.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Major Briggs has no memory of the place he was taken, but now has an odd tattoo on his neck. Andy and Dick break into Little Nicky's files. Mike and Nadine begin an affair. Shelly and Bobby's love is strained. Evelyn asks James to kill her husband.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Windom Earle has taken his first victim in the deadly chess game. Audrey tells Bobby they have to save Ben from his civil war fantasy. Leo awakes and attacks Shelly, but Bobby is able to fend him off.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: The police look for James in the Marsh murder. Bobby and Shelly tell Truman Leo escaped and Bobby reveals that he saw Hank shoot Leo the night the mill burned. Albert returns to Twin Peaks with information on Windom Earle.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Truman puts Hank in prison for the attempted murder of Leo, while Hank points the finger at Josie for the murder of Andrew Packard. Albert reveals that Josie shot Cooper. Ben enlists John Justice Wheeler to help him stop the Ghostwood plans.
